metadata.title: CVE-2021-47101 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: asix:fix uninit-value in asix_mdio_read() asix_read_cmd() may read less thansizeof(smsr) bytes and in this case smsr will be uninitialized. Fail log:BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value in asix_check_host_enabledrivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:82 [inline] BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value inasix_check_host_enable drivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:82 [inline]drivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:497 BUG: KMSAN: uninit-value inasix_mdio_read+0x3c1/0xb00 drivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:497drivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:497 asix_check_host_enabledrivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:82 [inline] asix_check_host_enabledrivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:82 [inline] drivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:497asix_mdio_read+0x3c1/0xb00 drivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:497drivers/net/usb/asix_common.c:497
